channel.title: NDTV News Search Records Found 1000
channel.description: NDTV.com provides the latest information from and in-depth coverage of India and the world. Find breaking news, India news, top stories, elections, politics, business, cricket, movies, lifestyle, health, live TV, videos, photos and more.

item.title: 61 Missing After Boat Sinks Near Indonesia's Bali: Report

media:content.media:description: According to the report, four people were rescued in the early hours of Thursday.

item.description: At least 61 people were missing after a ferry sank near the popular Indonesian island of Bali late Wednesday night, a local search and rescue agency said.
item.content:encoded: At least 61 people were missing after a ferry sank near the popular Indonesian island of Bali late Wednesday night, a local search and rescue agency said.

item.title: EU Commission Head Von Der Leyen Faces No-Confidence Vote

media:content.media:description: European Commission president Ursula von der Leyen will face a no-confidence vote in parliament.

item.description: European Commission president Ursula von der Leyen will face a no-confidence vote put forward by far-right MEPs on July 10 -- although it is likely to fail.
item.content:encoded: European Commission president Ursula von der Leyen will face a no-confidence vote put forward by far-right MEPs on July 10 -- although it is likely to fail.

item.title: India, Ghana Sign 4 Pacts To Deepen Ties

media:content.media:description: The agreements were signed following delegation-level talks between PM and Ghanaian President.

item.description: India and Ghana signed four Memoranda of Understanding (MoUs) on Wednesday to strengthen bilateral cooperation in key areas such as culture, health, standardisation, and institutional dialogue.
item.content:encoded: India and Ghana signed four Memoranda of Understanding (MoUs) on Wednesday to strengthen bilateral cooperation in key areas such as culture, health, standardisation, and institutional dialogue.

item.title: Ahead Of Trump Meeting, Israeli Ministers Urge Netanyahu To Annex West Bank

media:content.media:description: Jewish settlements in the West Bank are widely seen as violating international law.

item.description: Cabinet ministers in Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu's Likud party called on Wednesday for Israel to annex the Israeli-occupied West Bank before the Knesset recesses at the end of the month.
item.content:encoded: Cabinet ministers in Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu's Likud party called on Wednesday for Israel to annex the Israeli-occupied West Bank before the Knesset recesses at the end of the month.

item.title: South China Sea A Matter Of "Great Concern" To Quad: S Jaishankar

media:content.media:description: S Jaishankar said that the South China Sea was discussed during the Quad meeting in Washington.

item.description: External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar said that the South China Sea was discussed during the Quad Foreign Ministers' Meeting in Washington, as it remains an "issue of great concern" for all four member nations.
item.content:encoded: External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar said that the South China Sea was discussed during the Quad Foreign Ministers' Meeting in Washington, as it remains an "issue of great concern" for all four member nations.

item.title: PM Modi Conferred With Ghana's National Honour

media:content.media:description: PM Modi received the award from the Ghanaian President John Dramani Mahama.

item.description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi was on Wednesday conferred with 'The Officer of the Order of the Star of Ghana', the country's national honour, for his "distinguished statesmanship and influential global leadership".
item.content:encoded: Prime Minister Narendra Modi was on Wednesday conferred with 'The Officer of the Order of the Star of Ghana', the country's national honour, for his "distinguished statesmanship and influential global leadership".

item.title: PM Modi 5-Nation Tour Live Updates: PM Conferred With Ghana's National Honour

media:content.media:description: After visiting Ghana, the Prime Minister will head to Trinidad and Tobago.

item.description: LIve Updates: The Prime Minister will visit Argentina, Ghana, Namibia, Brazil, and Trinidad and Tobago. Ghana will be the first stop in the Prime Minister's visit, where he will meet President John Dramani Mahama
item.content:encoded: LIve Updates: The Prime Minister will visit Argentina, Ghana, Namibia, Brazil, and Trinidad and Tobago. Ghana will be the first stop in the Prime Minister's visit, where he will meet President John Dramani Mahama

item.title: Sean 'Diddy' Combs Denied Bail After Prostitution Conviction

media:content.media:description: Sean Diddy was found not guilty of more serious racketeering and sex trafficking crimes.

item.description: Sean "Diddy" Combs was denied bail on Wednesday after a trial in which he was convicted on federal prostitution charges but found not guilty of more serious racketeering and sex trafficking crimes.
item.content:encoded: Sean "Diddy" Combs was denied bail on Wednesday after a trial in which he was convicted on federal prostitution charges but found not guilty of more serious racketeering and sex trafficking crimes.

item.title: Netanyahu Vows To "Destroy" Hamas Amid Gaza Ceasefire Talks

media:content.media:description: Benjamin vowed Wednesday to completely eradicate Palestinian militant group Hamas.

item.description: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin vowed Wednesday to completely eradicate Palestinian militant group Hamas, despite pressure from US Donald Trump for a ceasefire in the war in Gaza.
item.content:encoded: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin vowed Wednesday to completely eradicate Palestinian militant group Hamas, despite pressure from US Donald Trump for a ceasefire in the war in Gaza.

item.title: India, Ghana Elevate Ties To Comprehensive Partnership: PM Modi

media:content.media:description: India-Ghana cooperation will be enhanced in areas such as training of armed forces, PM Modi said.

item.description: India and Ghana on Wednesday elevated their ties to the level of comprehensive partnership after Prime Minister Narendra Modi held wide-ranging talks with President John Dramani Mahama.
item.content:encoded: India and Ghana on Wednesday elevated their ties to the level of comprehensive partnership after Prime Minister Narendra Modi held wide-ranging talks with President John Dramani Mahama.

item.title: Why Do Americans Celebrate July 4? Know Its History And Significance
item.description: Americans observe this holiday with fireworks displays, patriotic parades and family gatherings.
item.content:encoded: Americans observe this holiday with fireworks displays, patriotic parades and family gatherings.

item.title: ICEBlock Creator Compares Tracking US Immigration Agents To Fighting Hitler's Rise

media:content.media:description: The creator of ICEBlock has compared the actions of the agency with "Hitler's rise to power"

item.description: Joshua Aaron, the creator of ICEBlock, the app that allows users to track the real time location of Immigration and Customs Enforcement officers across the US, has compared the actions of the agency with "Hitler's rise to power" in Nazi Germany.
item.content:encoded: Joshua Aaron, the creator of ICEBlock, the app that allows users to track the real time location of Immigration and Customs Enforcement officers across the US, has compared the actions of the agency with "Hitler's rise to power" in Nazi Germany.

item.title: Had To Put "Brave Face, Stoicism" During Cancer Treatment: Princess Kate

media:content.media:description: The princess has been gradually resuming her public royal role.

item.description: Kate, Britain's Princess of Wales, said that she had to put on a "brave face" throughout and following her cancer treatment last year, describing the ordeal as a life-changing experience.
item.content:encoded: Kate, Britain's Princess of Wales, said that she had to put on a "brave face" throughout and following her cancer treatment last year, describing the ordeal as a life-changing experience.

item.title: Why Is Mars Barren, Uninhabitable? NASA's Curiosity Rover Offers New Clue

media:content.media:description: There are currently several rovers searching Mars for signs of life.

item.description: Mars is thought to currently have all the necessary ingredients for life except for perhaps the most important one: liquid water
item.content:encoded: Mars is thought to currently have all the necessary ingredients for life except for perhaps the most important one: liquid water

item.title: Explained: After Sex Trafficking Trial, What's Next For Sean 'Diddy' Combs

media:content.media:description: Combs faces a maximum 10-year prison sentence on each of the two prostitution counts

item.description: Sean "Diddy" Combs was found guilty on Wednesday of prostitution-related offenses but cleared of more serious charges of racketeering conspiracy and sex trafficking.
item.content:encoded: Sean "Diddy" Combs was found guilty on Wednesday of prostitution-related offenses but cleared of more serious charges of racketeering conspiracy and sex trafficking.

item.title: As PM Modi Arrives In Ghana, Locals Chant 'Hare Rama Hare Krishna'

media:content.media:description: A group of young Ghanaian children greeted him with the devotional chant "Hare Rama Hare Krishna"

item.description: Over 15,000 Indians live in the West African country, with some being in Ghana for over 70 years. Some families are now the fourth generation in Ghana with some also acquiring Ghanaian citizenship.
item.content:encoded: Over 15,000 Indians live in the West African country, with some being in Ghana for over 70 years. Some families are now the fourth generation in Ghana with some also acquiring Ghanaian citizenship.

item.title: Aspiring Thai Model Brutally Assaulted In New York By Ex-Con Released On Bail

media:content.media:description: Zine Raksasutee sustained a split lip, cuts, and severe trauma.

item.description: The doctor was arrested three days later and indicted on multiple charges, including first-degree assault and robbery. If convicted, he faces up to 25 years in prison.
item.content:encoded: The doctor was arrested three days later and indicted on multiple charges, including first-degree assault and robbery. If convicted, he faces up to 25 years in prison.

item.title: Trump Vows To 'Make NYC Great Again', Calls Mamdani "Communist Lunatic"

media:content.media:description: Donald Trump said that he will save the New York from "Communist lunatic" Zohran Mamdani

item.description: US President Donald Trump said that he will save the New York City from "Communist lunatic" Indian-origin mayoral candidate Zohran Mamdani. In a post on Truth Social he wrote that he will not let the "Communist Lunatic" destroy New York.
item.content:encoded: US President Donald Trump said that he will save the New York City from "Communist lunatic" Indian-origin mayoral candidate Zohran Mamdani. In a post on Truth Social he wrote that he will not let the "Communist Lunatic" destroy New York.

item.title: Sean 'Diddy' Combs Acquitted Of Sex-Trafficking, Found Guilty Of Prostitution

media:content.media:description: Combs, once one of the most powerful figures in the music industry, had vehemently denied all charges.

item.description: Sean "Diddy" Combs was convicted of a US federal prostitution felony on Wednesday but acquitted on far more serious charges of racketeering and sex trafficking.
item.content:encoded: Sean "Diddy" Combs was convicted of a US federal prostitution felony on Wednesday but acquitted on far more serious charges of racketeering and sex trafficking.

item.title: Australia Cancels US Rapper Kanye West's Visa Over 'Heil Hitler' Song

media:content.media:description: More than 3,000 people signed a petition against West's performance in the Slovak capital.

item.description: Australia has cancelled US rapper Kanye West's visa over his song glorifying Nazi leader Adolf Hitler, the government said Wednesday.
item.content:encoded: Australia has cancelled US rapper Kanye West's visa over his song glorifying Nazi leader Adolf Hitler, the government said Wednesday.
